title: JUKLISLAB Research Chemicals
content: Category: Research Chemicals. Content: JUKLISLAB Research Chemicals EN ES DE NL PRODUCTS MAPS F.A.Q CONTACT CART EN ES NL DE all Thozalinone dpDMC Meprylcaine MCPPQ 3M-PCPy Thozalinone dpDMC Meprylcaine MCPPQ 3M-PCPy Dutch-TUSI DMC 2FDCK 4HO-MET 4HO-MiPT 4ACO-MET-pel 4HO-MET-pel Research Chemicals Juklislab is a small company with over a decade of chemical knowledge.  Our focus is on creating new molecules and researching these materials, all within the legal boundaries of the EU and its countries. Many of these chemicals were introduced into the market by ourselves. They are intended for laboratory, scientific and industrial use only and can be hazardous if mishandled. None of our products are intended for human consumption. We do not ship to the USA, UK, Romania and Switzerland. We stock these products Thozalinone dpDMC Meprylcaine MCPPQ 3M-PCPy Dutch-TUSI DMC 2FDCK 4HO-MET 4HO-MiPT 4ACO-MET-pel 4HO-MET-pel Guestbook News 3.12.2025 We discovered that Thozalinone is unstable as the HCl salt, we are now working on a different salt. If you still have any of our material, please contact us. 1.10.2025 We have developed our own variant of 'pink coke', which we call Dutch TUSI . We stock Thozalinone and are developing our own analogue of it. 31.9.2025 We stock Meprylcaine. 15.7.2025 First small batch of dpDMC arrived. 10.7.2025 DMC and our methaqualon analog MCPPQ arrived. 24.6.2025 We removed all products that get banned soon. 18.10.2024 We've recently expanded our range with a variety of new products, including pellets of existing items and psychedelics. Be sure to check them out! (overview) 22.3.2024 At the 67th Session of the Commission on Narcotic Drugs , our product 2FDCK was placed under international control, and will be prohibited in the Netherlands within a year. 17.8.2020 We got the first batch of 3MMA (3-Me-MA, 3-Methyl-Methamphetamine), our new invention. 6.6.2020 We just got the first batch of our invention Mephedrene . It is ready to order. Our internal studies suggest pharmacology similar to 4FA or 4MMC, releasing serotonin, dopamine, and norepinephrine. Newsletter Subscribe to newsletter about new products and discounts: Email: Current legislation All products must be legal in the destination country. We maintain a law-database covering many EU countries. It is displayed in the form of a red/green-map on each product-site or the link below. Nevertheless, it is the customer's responsibility to conduct the necessary research regarding their local laws as our research may be wrong. legal status map Payments The shop accepts bitcoins only at the moment. For a wire-transfer ask details per email. Additional info In case you would like to receive any additional information regarding our company or our products, contact us by email provided under CONTACT . JUKLISLAB Research Chemicals EN ES DE NL PRODUCTOS CARTA F.A.Q EMAIL CESTA EN ES NL DE all Thozalinone dpDMC Meprylcaine MCPPQ 3M-PCPy Thozalinone dpDMC Meprylcaine MCPPQ 3M-PCPy Dutch-TUSI DMC 2FDCK 4HO-MET 4HO-MiPT 4ACO-MET-pel 4HO-MET-pel Productos Químicos de Investigación Juklislab es una pequeña empresa con más de una década de conocimiento químico. Nuestro enfoque está en crear nuevas moléculas e investigar estos materiales, todo dentro de los límites legales de la UE y sus países. Muchos de estos productos químicos fueron introducidos en el mercado por nosotros mismos. Están destinados únicamente para uso en laboratorio, científico e industrial y pueden ser peligrosos si se manejan incorrectamente. Ninguno de nuestros productos está destinado al consumo humano. No enviamos a EE. UU., Reino Unido, Rumanía y Suiza. Tenemos en stock estos productos Thozalinone dpDMC Meprylcaine MCPPQ 3M-PCPy Dutch-TUSI DMC 2FDCK 4HO-MET 4HO-MiPT 4ACO-MET-pel 4HO-MET-pel Libro de visitas Novedades 16.4.2024 Nuestro producto a-PiHP fue prohibido en los Países Bajos. 29.3.2024 Hemos comprado una pequeña cantidad de a-PiHP, justo lo suficiente antes de su prohibición inminente en las próximas semanas. La estructura cristalina ha cambiado notablemente. 22.3.2024 En la 67ª Sesión de la Comisión de Estupefacientes , nuestro producto 2FDCK fue puesto bajo control internacional y será prohibido en los Países Bajos en un año. 10.12.2023 Hemos producido 2CMC y creemos que será nuestro nuevo superventas. 11.9.2023 La prohibición holandesa de 3cmc y Euthylon apareció en el Staatsblad , por lo que estas sustancias son ahora ilegales. También hubo una sesión plenaria hoy sobre la próxima ley analógica 'legislación' , por lo que las autoridades están avanzando con la ley. 21.8.2023 Puedes seleccionar GLS como mensajería nuevamente. 25.6.2023 Hemos descubierto un buen inhibidor triple de recaptación con una corta duración de acción que no está cubierto por ninguna de las leyes analógicas europeas. Estamos trabajando en su escalado. 11.3.2023 ¡Hemos reducido drásticamente todos los precios de venta! 31.1.2023 Ahora ofrecemos DPD como un nuevo método de envío. 28.3.2022 En una acción conjunta, la EMCDDA y la UNODC han puesto 3CMC y Euthylon bajo control internacional, por lo que se puede esperar una prohibición en los Países Bajos en 6-12 meses. 12.1.2022 Hicimos nuestro primer lote de O-PCE cristales. 18.11.2021 Hemos producido 2 nuevos productos. Los cristales de 2MMC están disponibles al por mayor y el polvo de 4Me-NEB está disponible en cantidades minoristas. 1.10.2020 Firmando la petición contra el próximo cambio de ley en los Países Bajos: startbeterdrugsbeleid.nl 17.8.2020 Recibimos el primer lote de 3MMA (3-Me-MA, 3-Metil-Metanfetamina), nuestra nueva invención. 6.6.2020 Acabamos de recibir el primer lote de nuestra invención Mephedrene . Está listo para ordenar. Nuestros estudios internos sugieren una farmacología similar a 4FA o 4MMC, liberando serotonina, dopamina y norepinefrina. 15.4.2020 El gobierno holandés planea prohibir cada una de las drogas del futuro. Aquí hay algunos documentos que luchan contra esta ley: juklislab.com/npswet 9.3.2020 Nuevo proyecto de ley holandés, descarga aquí . Boletín Suscríbete al boletín sobre nuevos productos y descuentos: Email: Legislación actual Todos los productos deben ser legales en el país de destino. Mantenemos una base de datos legal que cubre muchos países de la UE. Se muestra en forma de un mapa rojo/verde en cada sitio de producto o en el enlace a continuación. Sin embargo, es responsabilidad del cliente llevar a cabo la investigación necesaria sobre las leyes locales, ya que nuestra investigación podría ser incorrecta. mapa de situación jurídica Pagos Aceptamos monedas de bits y transferencias electrónicas. Información adicional En caso de que desee recibir información adicional sobre nuestra empresa o nuestros productos, póngase en contacto con nosotros a través del email proporcionado en la sección de EMAIL . Welcome to our Uplifting Collection—where every product is engineered to elevate your spirits, energize your mind, and turn your frown upside down. Whether you're battling the Monday blues or just need that extra spark to seize the day, we've got the cannabinoid cocktails to get you there. What Makes Our Uplifting Products Hit Different We’ve curated this collection with one mission: maximum elevation, minimum couch lock. Every uplifting product features: Sativa and sativa-leaning hybrid strains for energetic effects Terpene profiles that promote focus and euphoria Balanced cannabinoid ratios for mood enhancement Bright, flavor-forward taste profiles Lab-tested consistency every time From wake-and-bakes to midday pick-me-ups, these products are your ticket to the stratosphere of positivity. The Science of Getting Lifted Cannabinoids: Delta 8 = clear euphoria, Delta 9 = classic elevation, THCP = rocket fuel Terpenes: Limonene, pinene, terpinolene boost mood and energy Strains: Sativas and hybrids dominate—no sleepy indicas here Expect creative energy, better vibes, and highs designed to help you show up for life—not check out of it. Research Chemicals Hier vind je al onze onderzoekschemicaliën Lees meer Wat zijn Research Chemicals? Research Chemicals (ook wel NPS (Nieuwe Psychoactieve Stoffen) of designerdrugs in de volksmond genoemd) zijn stoffen waar nog niet veel onderzoek naar is gedaan. Daarom is het belangrijk om bij een betrouwbare leverancier uw Research Chemicals te kopen. Research Chemicals zijn onder te verdelen in verschillende productcategorieën. It is a presumed prodrug of LSD, which means it is thought to be converted into LSD-25 by the human body upon ingestion. What are the effects of 1S-LSD? As far as our research has shown, the effects of 1S-LSD are very similar to 1D-LSD (1T-LSD) 1V-LSD, 1cP-LSD and LSD-25. There is as of yet no consensus, and that is for the individual researcher to discover! How long does a 1S-LSD experience last? Normally, a standard research experience with either our 150mcg 1S-LSD Blotters or 225mcg 1S-LSD Pellets lasts around 6-8 hours. Where can I buy 1S-LSD? If you’ve never experienced C-liquids, imagine taking a smooth, flavorful hit from a vape pen, but instead of nicotine or regular weed, you’re puffing on something a little different, something infused with cannabinoids like CBD, Delta-8, HHC, or even synthetic THC alternatives. That’s the world of C-liquid vapes, a growing trend in the cannabis and vaping scene. These aren’t your typical e-liquids. While most vape juices are packed with nicotine or just flavoring, C-liquids are specially blended with extracts from hemp or lab-made cannabinoids. Some give you a mild buzz, others promise relaxation without the high, and a few are strong enough to rival traditional THC. Let’s talk a little bit about the different things that might be in C-liquids. CBD vape juice contains cannabidiol, a non-intoxicating compound derived from hemp. Users report effects like relaxation, reduced anxiety, and mild pain relief without psychoactive effects. It’s commonly chosen by those who want the therapeutic aspects of cannabis without impairment. Delta-8 THC liquid is a psychoactive cannabinoid chemically similar to Delta-9 THC (the main intoxicant in marijuana) but less potent. Because it’s often hemp-derived, it exists in a legal gray area in some regions. Its effects are milder than traditional THC, relaxing but not overwhelming. Delta-10 THC liquid shares similarities with Delta-8 but tends to produce a more energetic, clear-headed effect. Some users compare it to the difference between sativa and indica cannabis strains, though individual experiences vary. HHC vape juice contains hexahydrocannabinol, a hydrogenated form of THC with slightly altered chemical properties. It’s moderately potent, with effects falling between Delta-8 and Delta-9 THC. Its stability makes it appealing for manufacturers, but long-term research is limited. THC-O and THC-P liquids are synthetic or semi-synthetic cannabinoids with significantly heightened potency. THC-O is estimated to be three times stronger than Delta-9 THC, while THC-P binds even more aggressively to receptors. These compounds lack extensive safety studies, and their effects can be unpredictable. Synthetic cannabinoids (like Spice or K2) are entirely lab-made chemicals designed to mimic THC. Unlike naturally derived compounds, these substances have been linked to severe health risks. Be cautious with these. When it comes to vaping, we know that variety is the spice of life. That’s why  Hipster Vapes has their signature C-Liquid line that offers six distinct flavors, each designed to deliver not just a taste, but an entire vibe, whether you're chasing a crisp, fruity rush or a deep, strain-inspired relaxation. From juicy blueberry bursts to the candy-like sweetness of Zkittlez, these flavors are more than just e-juice, they’re an express ticket to the kind of high you’re in the mood for. Remember, according to the manufacturer, that these are not intended for human consumption. Exercise caution. Let’s be real, walking into your local headshop isn’t always an option. No flashy logos, no "HEY LOOK, I ORDERED A BONG" packaging, just plain, unmarked boxes that blend in with everything else in your mailbox. Your business stays your business, period. At the end of the day, Express Highs gets it. They know you want quality without the markup, privacy without the paranoia, and convenience without the compromise. Register Nederlands ( Dutch ) English Français ( French ) Italiano ( Italian ) Purchase 2-FDCK Spray Bottle Online Skip to content 2-FDCK Spray Bottle 20% Rated 5 out of 5 based on 1 customer rating € 60,00 amount Choose an option x1 x5 x10 Clear 2-FDCK Spray Bottle 20% quantity Add to cart SKU: 2-FDCK Spray Bottle Categories: Research Chemicals , Dissociatives , New Products Description Additional information Reviews (1) 2-FDCK (2-Fluorodeschloroketamine) is a dissociative compound that belongs to the arylcyclohexylamine class of chemicals. Distinguished by its structural similarity to ketamine, 2-FDCK offers stable chemical properties and has been synthesized for various specialized uses within the research and academic sectors. When provided in a spray bottle format, this product is optimized for consistent and precise delivery, ensuring utility in controlled settings. The spray bottle design is a key feature of this product. Engineered for ease of use and calibrated dispersion, the bottle ensures accurate application by delivering a fine mist of the compound. This configuration minimizes direct contact during handling and allows for efficient, uniform distribution of 2-FDCK. Constructed with chemical-resistant materials, the bottle securely contains 2-FDCK, preserving its purity and preventing degradation due to environmental factors such as sunlight, air, or moisture. The spray mechanism is designed to prevent leaks and accidental discharge, making it highly reliable for transportation and storage. 2-FDCK is known for its dissociative effects, achieved through its action as an NMDA receptor antagonist. Within laboratory studies, the compound’s properties have been analyzed for insights into neural pathways, consciousness studies, and receptor binding mechanisms. Its stability, coupled with its predictable pharmacological profile, has made 2-FDCK a subject of ongoing scientific experimentation. This product in spray form expands potential applications, particularly in scenarios where precision dosing or experimental surface application is required. The chemical synthesis process for 2-FDCK emphasizes purity and compliance with industry standards, ensuring that each batch retains consistent quality. Laboratory-grade refinement techniques are employed to guarantee high-grade results, making it suitable for researchers aiming to explore pharmacological and chemical interactions. The spray bottle solution caters to professionals and institutions that prioritize accuracy and safety during experimental procedures. Each unit of the 2-FDCK spray bottle comes with a detailed product data sheet, including chemical composition, storage instructions, and safety guidelines. The product should always be stored at a stable temperature in a dry environment, away from direct sources of light or heat. Storage recommendations ensure the integrity of the compound over time, enhancing its shelf life and usability. It is essential to note that 2-FDCK is strictly intended for research and analytical purposes only. It is not approved for human consumption or veterinary use. Care must be taken to follow all regulatory requirements, and users must adhere to established safety protocols during handling and application. Personnel engaging with 2-FDCK should utilize appropriate protective equipment, including gloves, goggles, and lab coats, to ensure safety in research environments. This product provides a combination of an innovative delivery system and high-quality chemical standards. The spray bottle format not only streamlines application but also enhances safety and storage capabilities. For research institutions, laboratories, and professionals seeking a dependable and precise 2-FDCK solution, this product offers an advanced tool suited to diverse experimental needs. amount x1, x5, x10 1 review for 2-FDCK Spray Bottle 20% Rated 5 out of 5 Tim – March 18, 2025 Good quality and more product than expected Add a review Cancel reply Your rating * Rate… Perfect Good Average Not that bad Very poor Your review * Name * Email * Save my name, email, and website in this browser for the next time I comment. Our Commitment Quality • Reliability • Integrity Trusted research supplier since 2019. Strict quality control. Worldwide delivery. Welcome to Chems.ca Trusted Worldwide for High-Purity Research Chemicals Researchers rely on Chems.ca for consistent quality, discreet shipping,
    and strict sourcing standards. Our catalog includes 1P-LSD , 4-AcO-DMT , 5-MeO-DMT , and other analytical-grade compounds. We support scientific and educational research with dependable service and full transparency. All products are for educational, scientific, and in-vitro research only. Not intended for human or veterinary use. Featured Selection Preview Key Compounds from the Catalog A focused snapshot of selected lysergamides and tryptamines. Open a card to view technical details,
        or explore the catalog for the full lineup. Explore the Full Catalog Tryptamines 5-MeO-MiPT Form: Freebase View Description Shop 5-MeO-MiPT X Formula: C₁₅H₂₂N₂O Molar Mass: 246.35 g·mol⁻¹ IUPAC: N-[2-(5-Methoxy-1H-indol-3-yl)ethyl]-N-methylpropan-2-amine Form: Freebase 5-MeO-MiPT, or 5-methoxy-N-methyl-N-isopropyltryptamine, is a synthetic tryptamine that belongs to
              the 5-methoxy-substituted indole family, structurally related to 5-MeO-DMT, 5-MeO-DiPT, and MiPT.
              First synthesized in the 1980s, this compound has been of interest in forensic and analytical research
              due to its distinct chemical profile and relationship to naturally occurring tryptamines. ⚠️ Safety Precaution: This product is intended strictly for research and forensic applications. It is not for human or veterinary use.
              Handle with appropriate safety protocols. Hide Description More info Lysergamides 1P-LSD (100mcg Blotters) Form: Blotter View Description Shop 1P-LSD (100mcg Blotters) X Formula: C₂₃H₂₉N₃O₂ Molar Mass: 379.504 g·mol⁻¹ IUPAC: (6aR,9R)-N,N-Diethyl-7-methyl-4-propanoyl-6,6a,8,9-tetrahydroindolo[4,3-fg]quinoline-9-carboxamide Form: Blotter 1P-LSD, or 1-propionyl-lysergic acid diethylamide, is a lysergamide derivative first synthesized in 2015.
              It is a structural analog of LSD, distinguished by the presence of a propionyl group attached to the indole nitrogen.
              Due to its close structural relationship with LSD, ALD-52, and 1B-LSD, 1P-LSD is frequently examined in chemical
              research involving lysergic acid derivatives. Researchers have studied its stability, potential degradation pathways,
              and interactions with chromatography-based detection methods. ⚠️ Safety Precaution: This product is strictly intended for research and forensic applications. It is not for human or veterinary use.
              Proper safety protocols should be followed when handling. Hide Description More info Tryptamines 4-AcO-DMT Form: Fumarate View Description Shop 4-AcO-DMT X Formula: C₁₄H₁₈N₂O₂ Molar Mass: 246.310 g·mol⁻¹ IUPAC: 3-[2-(Dimethylamino)ethyl]-1H-indol-4-yl acetate Form: Fumarate First synthesized by Albert Hofmann in 1963, 4-AcO-DMT, or O-Acetylpsilocin, is a semi-synthetic derivative of psilocin.
              It is structurally similar to the naturally occurring alkaloid found in psilocybin mushrooms, differing only by the presence
              of an acetoxy group. Due to its close relationship with other tryptamines, it has been studied in the field of forensic and
              analytical chemistry for its chemical behavior and stability. ⚠️ Safety Precaution: This product is for research and forensic applications only. Not for human or veterinary use.
              Handle according to appropriate safety protocols. Hide Description More info Tryptamines 4-HO-MET Form: Fumarate View Description Shop 4-HO-MET X Formula: C₁₃H₁₈N₂O Molar Mass: 218.300 g·mol⁻¹ IUPAC: 3-{2-[Ethyl(methyl)amino]ethyl}-1H-indol-4-ol Form: Fumarate 4-HO-MET, or 4-hydroxy-N-methyl-N-ethyltryptamine, belongs to the tryptamine family and is structurally related
              to psilocin, the active metabolite of psilocybin mushrooms. It is an ethyl-substituted homolog of 4-AcO-DMT and
              shares a similar core structure to naturally occurring tryptamines. First documented by Alexander Shulgin in “TiHKAL,”
              this compound has been of interest in analytical chemistry for its role in the study of synthetic and naturally
              derived tryptamines. ⚠️ Safety Precaution: This product is for research and forensic applications only. Not for human or veterinary use.
              Handle with appropriate safety measures. Hide Description More info Worldwide Coverage Discreet Packaging Research-Focused Logistics Shipping Protocols for Serious Researchers All orders ship from Canada using vetted, discreet methods that have delivered
            consistently high success rates to researchers around the world. Same-Day Dispatch Window Orders paid Monday–Thursday before 8:00 AM EST are processed
                  and shipped the same business day . Next-Day Handling Payments received after 8:00 AM EST are shipped on the next business day . Shipping Schedule No shipping on Fridays, Saturdays, or Sundays to keep all

          Transparent sourcing, rigorous testing, and unmatched service. Read more → Shop Catalog Browse & Shop Explore our full range of research materials and shop with confidence.
          Clean layouts, accurate labeling, and consistent quality in every listing. View catalog → Quality • Authenticity • Consistency Your Research Matters to Us Every product in the Chems.ca catalog is stocked with authentic and pure research chemicals.
        We are proud to provide material that is free of impurities and suitable for serious research workflows. Recognizing your work: When you choose us, we treat your research needs as if they were our own.
          Every compound is handled, labelled, and packaged with care. Meticulous quality control: We keep detailed records of all chemicals, from batch information
          to how each item is labelled and prepared for shipment. Discreet, secure shipping: All orders are mailed out in discreet packaging,
          so there is never a need for concern when receiving your delivery. Don't hesitate to get in touch with us We’re always happy to answer your questions. We pride ourselves on bringing you unparalleled customer service.
    If you are at all worried, just write us a message and we’ll get back to you as fast as we can. Normally we
    respond in under an hour. However, sometimes there may be delays. We appreciate your patience. Email: [email protected] Name Email Subject Message Send Message Frequently Asked Questions Straightforward answers to the most common questions we receive about orders,
    verification, shipping, and research products. Is Tracked Shipping Available? We provide tracked shipping exclusively to Canadian addresses. All other orders are dispatched using Standard Letter Mail, which does not include tracking. Nevertheless, we ensure our shipping is both swift and reliable. Need to Sign for the Package? A signature is not necessary upon delivery. Could You Explain Standard Letter Mail? Often referred to as "Snail Mail," Standard Letter Mail is a traditional and commonly utilized method of postage. Your order is placed in a conventional envelope and sent with an attached postage stamp. Why Isn’t Tracking Available for Shipments to the United States? Shipments with tracking or expedited options are subjected to stricter verifications at borders, increasing the likelihood of seizure by customs. Our chosen method, Standard Letter Mail, may be somewhat slower, but has proven remarkably successful with no recorded order confiscations. Are Larger Orders Prone to Customs Issues? No, larger orders are partitioned into multiple packages to avoid such issues. This method has been unerringly successful and presents no additional risk for bulk orders. When Will Out-of-Stock Products Be Available Again? Restocking is continually in process, but acquiring certain products can present challenges. We genuinely appreciate your patience. Will New Products Be Introduced? Yes, we consistently enhance our catalog with new products. Should you have product recommendations, we encourage you to contact us via email. What if My Order Fails to Arrive? We are dedicated to exceptional customer service and evaluate situations such as these on an individual basis, ensuring efforts are made to resolve issues satisfactorily. Is the package discreet? Indeed, orders are dispatched in a standard, unembellished white envelope. Do You Provide Free Samples? We regret that we are unable to distribute free samples at this time. Are There Additional Products Available Beyond the Online Catalog? No, all available products are detailed within our online catalog. My Order Has Not Arrived After Two Weeks, What Should I Do? While unfortunate, delays, particularly with Canada Post, are not uncommon in the current climate. We appreciate your patience and understanding in these instances. Account & Rewards Create an Account & Unlock Extra Value Approved Chems.ca accounts receive an instant $10 signup bonus ,

        Referral bonuses apply once the referred researcher is approved and places their first order. Research Details for              5-MeO-MiPT Technical information below is provided to support analytical, forensic, and other laboratory-based applications involving 5-methoxy–substituted indole derivatives and synthetic tryptamines. Overview Identity & Form Analytical Use Handling & Storage 5-MeO-MiPT (5-methoxy-N-methyl-N-isopropyltryptamine) is a synthetic tryptamine belonging to the 5-methoxy–substituted indole family. It can be described by the IUPAC name N-[2-(5-methoxy-1H-indol-3-yl)ethyl]-N-methylpropan-2-amine and has the molecular formula C₁₅H₂₂N₂O (M_r 246.35 g·mol⁻¹). In the literature, 5-MeO-MiPT is frequently discussed alongside other 5-methoxy tryptamines such as 5-MeO-DMT, 5-MeO-DiPT, and MiPT for comparative analytical work. First synthesized in the 1980s, it has been of interest in forensic and toxicological contexts due to its distinct chromatographic and mass-spectral profile and its relationship to naturally occurring tryptamines. In research settings, 5-MeO-MiPT may be included in comparative studies focusing on: • LC-MS and GC-MS fragmentation behavior within the 5-methoxy tryptamine series; • Chromatographic retention and separation under varied stationary phases and mobile-phase conditions; • Stability, storage behavior, and sample-preparation effects for indole-based freebase materials. Class Tryptamine Form 5-MeO-MiPT Freebase Formula C₁₅H₂₂N₂O Molar Mass 246.35 g·mol⁻¹ Also Known As Moxy Structural information, formula, and molar mass above refer to the 5-MeO-MiPT freebase. The material is supplied as neat freebase to allow flexible preparation of custom solutions, calibrators, or spiking standards. Laboratories should account for the freebase form when preparing mass-based or molar dilutions and verify concentration using their own validated analytical methods. This material is intended for use as a reference standard or analyte in: • Method development and validation for LC-MS(/MS) and GC-MS analysis of synthetic tryptamines and related indole derivatives; • Retention-time and fragmentation-pattern comparison against unknown or casework samples; • Preparation of calibration solutions, quality-control samples, and system suitability checks in forensic and toxicology laboratories; • Academic research focused on physicochemical characterization, stability, and comparative profiling of 5-methoxy–substituted tryptamines. No claims are made or implied regarding pharmacology, toxicology, safety in humans or animals, or suitability for any form of in vivo experimentation. All use must remain within appropriate institutional, ethical, and regulatory frameworks. • Store in a cool, dry environment, protected from direct light and excessive humidity. • Keep the container tightly closed when not in use to minimize exposure to air and potential evaporation or oxidation. • Use appropriate PPE (gloves, eye protection, lab coat) during handling, transfer, and solution preparation. • Where possible, prepare and handle solutions in a well-ventilated area or fume hood as part of good laboratory practice. • Avoid repeated freeze–thaw or open–close cycles by aliquoting material where appropriate. • Dispose of unused material, solutions, and solvent waste according to local regulations for chemical substances and laboratory waste. Always follow your institution’s internal safety guidelines and risk assessments when working with analytical reference materials and synthetic tryptamines. All Chems.ca materials are supplied strictly for laboratory, analytical, and forensic research. No products are sold for human or veterinary use. Suitable as a reference material for chromatographic, mass-spectral, and stability studies of lysergamide derivatives. Blotters are sealed in laboratory-grade pouches to limit light, moisture, and atmospheric exposure. ⚠️ Research Use Only — Not for human or veterinary consumption. Handle with appropriate laboratory safety protocols. Research Details for              1P-LSD (100mcg Blotters) Technical information below is provided to support chromatographic, forensic, and other laboratory-based applications involving lysergic acid derivatives. Overview Identity & Form Analytical Use Handling & Storage 1P-LSD (1-propionyl-lysergic acid diethylamide) is a synthetic lysergamide belonging to the broader class of lysergic acid derivatives. The molecule incorporates a propionyl group at the indole nitrogen, maintaining the lysergamide core while modifying physicochemical properties and potential degradation pathways. In analytical and forensic laboratories, 1P-LSD is often examined alongside other lysergamide analogs for comparative studies of: • LC-MS/MS and GC-MS fragmentation profiles within the lysergamide family; • Chromatographic retention and separation under varying stationary and mobile phase conditions; • Stability and degradation behavior (e.g., light, heat, pH, and oxidative stress) in solution and on blotter substrates. Class Lysergamide Form 1P-LSD Hemi-L-Tartrate (100mcg blotter units) Formula C₂₃H₂₉N₃O₂ Molar Mass 379.50 g·mol⁻¹ Also Known As 1-propionyl-lysergic acid diethylamide Structural information, molecular formula, and molar mass above refer to the 1P-LSD freebase unless otherwise indicated. The commercial material is supplied as the hemi-L-tartrate salt deposited onto blotter paper, which should be taken into account when calculating absolute quantities or designing extraction and calibration procedures. This material is intended for use as a reference standard or analyte in: • Development, optimization, and validation of LC-MS/MS and GC-MS methods for lysergamide detection; • Retention-time and fragmentation comparison against unknown or casework samples; • Preparation of calibration curves and system suitability checks in forensic and toxicological workflows; • Academic research focused on lysergamide stability, extraction efficiency, and analytical characterization. No claims are made or implied regarding pharmacology, toxicology, safety in humans or animals, or suitability for any form of in vivo work. Explore our range of meticulously synthesized compounds designed for laboratory research purposes. One such compound is 3,4-Methylenedioxyphenmetrazine, commonly abbreviated as MDPM. Overview: MDPM is a synthetic compound belonging to the phenylmorpholine class. It shares structural similarities with other substituted phenethylamines and phenylmorpholines. Researchers often use MDPM for studying its effects on neurotransmitter systems and receptor interactions in-vitro. Properties: Chemical Formula: C12H15NO3 Molecular Weight: 221.256 g/mol Appearance: White powder Purity: ≥ 98% Solubility: Soluble in organic solvents (e.g., ethanol, methanol) Research Applications: MDPM is primarily utilized in laboratory settings for scientific investigations into its pharmacological properties. Researchers study its interactions with serotonin receptors, dopamine receptors, and norepinephrine transporters within in-vitro research. Understanding MDPM’s effects on these systems can provide insights into its potential therapeutic applications or mechanisms of action. Safety Information: MDPM is strictly intended for research purposes by qualified personnel only. Handle with caution and adhere to proper laboratory safety protocols. Ensure adequate ventilation and personal protective equipment (PPE) when handling MDPM. Store MDPM in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight and moisture. Keep out of reach of unauthorized individuals, children, and pets. Legal Status: As a research chemical, MDPM may be subject to various regulations and restrictions in different jurisdictions. Researchers are responsible for ensuring compliance with applicable laws and regulations governing the purchase, possession, and use of this research chemical in their region. With a molecular structure closely resembling ketamine, Fluorexetamine offers researchers a unique window into the realms of neurochemistry and psychopharmacology. Chemical Class and Properties Fluorexetamine crystal belongs to the arylcyclohexylamine class of research chemicals, characterized by their cyclohexanone ring structure and aromatic phenyl group. Key properties of Fluorexetamine include: Chemical Formula: C14H17NOF Molecular Weight: 233.29 g/mol Boiling Point: Approximately 191°C (375.8°F) Solubility: Soluble in organic solvents such as ethanol and methanol, sparingly soluble in water. In Vitro Research Opportunities Unlock the potential of Fluorexetamine crystal in your laboratory experiments, as you delve into its diverse pharmacological effects. Explore a myriad of research avenues, including: Neurotransmitter Modulation: Investigate Fluorexetamine’s impact on neurotransmitter systems, uncovering its potential for therapeutic interventions. Receptor Binding Studies: Examine the affinity of Fluorexetamine for various receptor sites, elucidating its mechanism of action and pharmacokinetic properties. Cellular Signaling Pathways: Probe into the intricate signaling cascades influenced by Fluorexetamine, shedding light on its role in neuronal function and dysfunction. Storage and Handling Instructions To maintain the integrity and stability of Fluorexetamine crystal, adhere to the following storage and handling guidelines: Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight. Keep the product tightly sealed in its original packaging to prevent contamination. Handle with care using appropriate laboratory safety protocols, including gloves and eye protection. The extra-strength version of our gum builds on the sacred heritage of Sceletium tortuosum by including an extra portion of Kanna extract and and amplifies it with a carefully calibrated blend of cutting-edge nutraceuticals. It’s a next-generation functional chewing gum designed for those seeking more. One piece contains 25 mg MT165 Kanna extract, equivalent to 75 mg MT55 Kanna — delivering a higher Mesembrine profile for a deeper, longer-lasting uplift 25 mg Mucuna pruriens extract (20% L-Dopa) — dopamine support for drive, reward, and pleasure 25 mg Rhodiola rosea extract (standardized to >5% Rosavins & 2% Salidroside) — for stress resilience, cognitive stamina, and physical endurance 25 mg 7,8-Dihydroxyflavone (7,8-DHF) — mimics BDNF to support cognitive plasticity and emotional resilience 25 mg Oroxylin A — a flavonoid with pro-cognitive, anti-fatigue, and GABA-A antagonistic activity, promoting mental clarity and attention without sedation 25 mg Triacetyluridine — may enhance cognitive processes like memory, focus, and attention by increasing neurotransmitters like dopamine, acetylcholine, and norepinephrine Description Energy+ Extra Strength Kanna Gum Shine On! The next evolution in botanical performance gum, where ancient botanical wisdom meets modern-day neuroscience. LiftMode’s Extra Strength Kanna Gum reimagines the mood-enhancing power of Sceletium tortuosum through a bold and sophisticated blend of natural nootropics. Rooted in centuries-old indigenous use of Kanna, fused with cutting-edge neuropharmacology, this formula delivers a distinctly elevated experience for modern stressors. The extra-strength version of our gum builds on the sacred heritage of Sceletium tortuosum by including an extra portion of Kanna extract and and amplifies it with a carefully calibrated blend of cutting-edge nutraceuticals. It’s a next-generation functional chewing gum designed for those seeking more. This gum is designed to go beyond uplifting mood, supporting deeper focus, mental clarity, emotional strength, and long-lasting resilience. Each chewable piece provides a rapid onset and smooth, sustained release, ideal for daytime performance or anytime clarity.  The benefits last for hours. Whereas our original Kanna Gum is optimized for a clean, energized uplift and subtle mood boost—ideal for general mood support and daily enhancement—Extra Strength Kanna Gum introduces a nootropic-level formula for more intense support across emotional, cognitive, and physical domains. Energy+ Extra Strength Kanna Gum is tailored for those seeking broader nootropic benefits, supporting not just mood, but cognition, motivation, stress tolerance, and neurogenesis. Our Energy+ Extra Strength Kanna Gum is designed to elevate your awareness, lighten your mood, and envelop you in a zone of heightened focus and relaxed energy. Experience the harmonious blend of ancient botanical wisdom and contemporary convenience - embrace the botanical legacy, relish the cinnamon refreshment, and let every chew guide you to a lifted state of mind where clarity and positivity thrive. Our standard size contains 12 pieces (servings)  of Kanna gum. Each piece contains standardized extra high potency proprietary Kanna extract specifically developed for LiftMode Kanna Gum. Each piece serves as a discrete, elegant pathway to a feeling of enhanced well-being, offering subtle sustained release of the plant’s natural properties. Ideal for navigating the challenges of modern life, it invites you to savor a moment of Zen on the go, elevating a daily routine into a ritual of renewal. Unique Selling Points: Synergistic Nutrients ◉ L-Dopa (Mucuna) fuels dopamine pathways, improving drive, alertness, and positive reinforcement. ◉ Rhodiola rosea acts as an adaptogen, reducing fatigue while sharpening focus and physical endurance. Rhodiola rosea boosts mitochondrial energy and stress adaptability, helping you stay sharp under pressure. ◉ Triacetyluridine — may enhance cognitive processes like memory, focus, and attention by increasing neurotransmitters like dopamine, acetylcholine, and norepinephrine ◉ 7,8-Dihydroxyflavone mimics BDNF, promoting neurogenesis, learning, and emotional resilience. ◉ Oroxylin A is a unique flavonoid studied for its ability to reduce mental fatigue, enhance focus, and modulate GABA-A for wakeful clarity—balancing stimulation without jitteriness. LiftMode Kanna Gum stands at the crossroads of heritage and innovation. By integrating the storied Kanna plant into a form that fits conveniently into the flow of one's day, while optimizing absorption in a tasteful way closest to the time-honored method through which the plant was traditionally used, we offer a unique product that honors the past while embracing the future. Our gum offers a delightful, enjoyable way to experience the benefits of Sceletium tortuosum without interrupting the daily rhythm of your life. The perfect companion for those seeking a natural boost to their mood, mental clarity, and natural energy, wrapped in the convenience of a mouth-watering chew. Scientific consensus While the study of Sceletium tortuosum is ongoing, preliminary research supports its use for promoting emotional well-being and reducing stress within the context of traditional use and anecdotal evidence. Our commitment to science-backed wellness ensures that LiftMode Kanna gum is formulated with respect to both historical knowledge and contemporary research. As with all of our products, Kanna Gum’s active ingredient is third-party tested and verified for purity and identity. For more discussion on potential adverse effects, and the body of research surrounding the responsible use of Kanna, please read our ‘Disclaimer & Other Info’ section on this page. Sustainability Rooted in respect for the earth and its resources, Kanna Gum is produced with sustainability at its core. From the ethically sourced Kanna plant, harvested in collaboration with indigenous communities, and then crafted into artisanally produced gum in our own cGMP-certified facility, LiftMode Gum is designed with the Planet in mind. Let every chew guide you to a heightened state of mind, where clarity and positivity thrive. Shipping Restrictions Several jurisdictions do not permit the import of Kanna products. We cannot ship Kanna to the following locales: Louisiana Please ensure that your local jurisdiction does not have any restrictions on Kanna before attempting to receive or import this product. The statements on this page have not been evaluated by the FDA. The products on this page are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Instructions & Ingredients As a dietary supplement, chew 1 serving up to 2 times daily. Please start with the lowest suggested single-serving quantity, and take breaks every few minutes to assess your initial response.  Do not exceed one piece per 2 hours, 2 pieces per day, or 12 pieces per week. To avoid the risk of adverse interactions, do not combine with antidepressants (including SSRIs and MAOIs), anti-psychotics, cough suppressants, or other psychotropic prescriptions, medications, supplements, or substances. Our Kanna Gum (Energizing Cinnamon, 50mg Strength) is of the highest quality. Disclaimer & Other Info Store securely in a dry cool location away from direct sunlight. Keep out of reach of children and pets.  Do not take this or any other supplement, and instead consult doctor about use, if you are under the age of 18, pregnant or breastfeeding, taking prescription or OTC / nonprescription drugs, or if you have any known or suspected medical conditions. Do not use if product safety seal was damaged or missing upon receipt. Kanna Safety and Cautions Keep out of reach of those under the age of 18! We do not recommend using this product more than in amounts exceeding 2 servings per day or 12 servings per week at the recommended serving size. Please consult your healthcare provider prior to consuming Kanna extract. To avoid the risk of adverse interactions, do not combine with psychiatric medications or mind-altering substances, including antidepressants (e.g. SSRIs and MAOIs), anti-psychotics, cough suppressants, or other psychotropic prescriptions, medications, supplements, or substances. Use caution when driving or operating heavy machinery after consuming Kanna products. Potential side effects are generally uncommon or rare at the recommended serving size and usage guidance - but might be more commonly experienced if several servings are consumed at once - and may include: allergic reaction, anxiety, chills, nausea, upset stomach, overstimulation, irritability, insomnia, rapid heartbeat, pupil dilatation, dizziness, drowsiness, fatigue, low mood or mood swings, headaches, and visual disturbances. There is not enough data to say whether Kanna extract is safe for pregnant or breastfeeding women and, therefore, we recommend Kanna consumption should be avoided. The statements on this page have not been evaluated by the FDA. The products on this page are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. LiftMode’s Kanna extract based products are produced with among the most potent and high-quality Kanna extracts available.  Kanna extracts are reputed to produce tranquil, cheerful and motivated states of mind, in part by supporting healthy serotonin levels. Kanna extracts may also help to support cognitive function and help work through mild occasional cravings.  – Boosts Mood – Reduces Stress – Promotes Tranquility  CAUTION: We strongly discourage combining Kanna with psychiatric prescription medications, including SSRIs, antipsychotics, or MAOIs, or with any other prescription or over the counter medicines that may significantly affect serotonin levels or the cardiovascular system (such as cough suppressant and decongestant medicines). There is a possibility of interactions with such combinations. Arctic Root Extract [≥5% Rosavins, ≥2% Salidroside] (Rhodiola rosea) Arctic Root Extract [≥5% Rosavins, ≥2% Salidroside] (Rhodiola rosea) Rhodiola rosea is an herbal extract used as an ingredient in dietary supplement products. It is said to prevent stress and fatigue, while also acting as a powerful antioxidant and to improve cognitive performance.   - Balances Stress - Boosts Cognition - Powerful Antioxidant Oroxylin A Oroxylin A Oroxylin A is a unique and cutting-edge plant compound, and of the primary flavonoids of *Scutellaria baicalensis* (Blue Skullcap). Flavones are active compounds known primarily for their antioxidant properties. The flavonoid compound Oroxylin A, is recognized today for its therapeutic effects in improving symptoms of stress, enhancing catecholamine production, and supporting memory.  - Boosts Levels of Catecholamines Dopamine and Norepinephrine - Antioxidant Properties - Unique and Cutting-Edge Plant Extract 7,8-Dihydroflavone 7,8-Dihydroflavone 7,8-DHF (7,8-Dihydroxyflavone) is a naturally occurring flavonoid with possible cognition-enhancing properties. Its recent discovery has spurred research into its unique properties.   By enhancing TrkB expression, 7,8-DHF may help to increase the rate new synapses are formed, thus enhancing learning. Some researchers hypothesize that 7,8-DHF does not bind TrkB directly, but instead acts on an unknown pathway that results in the same end result--increased TrkB activity. 7,8-DHF is believed to have a similar degree of neurogenic activities as BDNF.   On top of its effects on neurogenesis, 7,8-DHF is also neuroprotective. It has antioxidant properties in the brain that are independent of its TrkB activity. While these mechanisms are not understood, it is believed to activate the Akt/PKB pathway.   * Supports Healthy Memory and Focus * May Promote Adult Neurogenesis  * Neuroprotective and Antioxidant Triacetyluridine (TAU) Triacetyluridine (TAU) Triacetyluridine is a naturally-occurring compound and precursor to the nucleoside Uridine (pictured to the left). Uridine plays an important role in cellular signaling, and supports both CDP-Choline and dopamine levels in the brain. For this reason, Triacetyluridine is becoming a sought after dietary supplement for its perceived effect in boosting cognitive function, memory and mood.  - Promotes Healthy Memory and Cognition - Potent Neuroprotective Benefits - Supports a Positive Mood Mucuna Pruriens Extract Mucuna Pruriens Extract *Mucuna pruriens* is a tropical legume that is native to Africa and tropical Asia and has been used in eastern medicine for thousands of years. The primary active ingredient in *Mucuna pruriens* is an amino acid referred to as L-Dopa (or levodopa) which can also be bio-synthesized from L-Tyrosine.  L-Dopa is a natural precursor to dopamine, but can also help promote healthy levels of norepinephrine and epinephrine as well, which can be used to facilitate boosted learning, improved mood, increased energy, effective stress management, and even natural boosts in libido.   L-Dopa also has the natural ability to pass the blood-brain barrier, allowing for healthy hormone production in the brain; showing an effective potential for a powerful and regenerative boost in brain health.   - Improves Mood - Sharpens Focus - Promotes Healthy Libido Organic Gum Base Organic Gum Base Gum base is what gives chewing gum its “chew.” It is made of a combination of food-grade polymers, waxes and softeners that give gum the texture desired by consumers and enable it to effectively deliver sweetness, flavor and various other benefits, including dental benefits. A polymer is a string of molecules (monomers) that usually contain carbon and hydrogen. Polymers are found naturally in the human body, animals, plants, and minerals. For example, DNA is a polymer, as are the proteins and starches in the foods we eat. In chewing gum, polymers are what provide gum with its basic elastic properties. Chewing gum may help reduce stress and boost memory. Chewing gum while performing tasks may help improve various aspects of brain function. Organic gum base has great mechanical strength, good barrier qualities, and antibacterial or germ resistance. Xylitol Xylitol Xylitol is a natural compound that can be found in a variety of plants, vegetables and fruits, including strawberries, raspberries, plums, mushrooms, cauliflower, birch bark, corn husks, rice, oat, wheat husks, birch and beechwood. Xylitol has wide-spread usage as a natural sweetener for culinary practices. Xylitol has a sweetness that is similar to regular sugar; but contains up to 40% less calories and is generally known to not have any of the harmful effects of sugar.   - Healthy Circulatory System - Promotes Healthy Teeth - Strengthens Bones Natural Cinnamon Flavor Natural Cinnamon Flavor Extracts from the bark as well as leaves, flowers, fruits, and roots of the cinnamon tree. Cinnamon is high in antioxidants, which may help protect against disease, inflammation, and aging. Cinnamon may help improve insulin response, which may help your body regulate blood sugar levels. Cinnamon may help reduce overall cholesterol levels. Cinnamon may help soothe the stomach. Cinnamon may help improve gut health. Cinnamon may help improve dental hygiene. Cinnamon also contains potassium, magnesium, and calcium, which may help with blood pressure, heart rate, and skeletal health. Food Grade Silica Food Grade Silica Silicon dioxide, also known as silica, is a naturally occurring compound made of silicon and oxygen. It has many uses. Silicon dioxide is used as an anti-caking agent and flow aid in powdered foods and supplements. It can also be used to preserve color and carry flavors and fragrances. Silicon dioxide is found in many plant foods, including barley, oats, wheat, rice, carrots, potatoes, green beans, apples, and bananas. Sorbitan Monostearate Sorbitan Monostearate Sorbitan monostearate is used as an emulsifier, helps yeast retain moisture and extend its shelf life, prevents ice crystals and promotes emulsification, improves volume and texture, stabilizes the emulsion of fats and oils and keeps oil and water mixed together. Some people use Kanna extract for cognition and focus. Our MT55 Kanna Extract is made with selected strains of Kanna and standardized for a high and consistent Mesembrine content, hence MT55 tends to emphasize the energized and elevated mood and state of mind aspects of Kanna's effects, yielding a fast acting and pleasantly stimulating Kanna experience. Kanna extracts contain several important alkaloids. For purposes of nomenclature, scientists have bestowed the best known of the Kanna-derived alkaloids with the prefix: “mesembr-”. The most important alkaloids include: Mesembrine Mesembrenone delta-7 Mesembrenone Mesembrenol Mesembranol Kanna Extract powder is known by a number of alternative names, including: Sceletium tortuosum Mesembryanthemum tortuosum Channa Kougoed Mesmebrine Mesembrenone Mesembryanthemaceae S.tortuosum MT55 Extract Sceletium Scientific Consensus An extremely long history of use suggests that using the fermented plant is safe and effective, but does not provide absolute proof. Further, very few studies have been conducted using a strong Kanna Extract powder. More research is needed to fully understand the significance of the benefits and adverse effects of this supplement. There is not enough research about the safety of Kanna Extract powder for pregnant and breastfeeding women. LIFTMODE NEVER USES FILLERS OR EXCIPIENTS! Kanna extracts are reputed to produce tranquil yet cheerful states of mind. A wide variety of different extracts have proliferated on the market; many of them inferior or fake. Accepter tous les cookies et continuer Paramètres du cookie Paramètres des cookies Politique de confidentialité Paramètres Déclaration relative aux cookies Nous souhaitons obtenir votre autorisation pour utiliser vos données aux fins suivantes : Cookies fonctionnels Les cookies fonctionnels assurent le bon fonctionnement de notre site web. Cookies de préférences Les cookies de préférences permettent à un site web de mémoriser des informations qui influencent le comportement et la conception du site web. Cookies analytiques Les cookies analytiques nous donnent un aperçu de la manière dont notre site web est utilisé. Sur la base de ces informations, nous pouvons améliorer l’ergonomie de notre site web. Que sont les cookies ? Les cookies et les technologies similaires sont de très petits documents texte ou des morceaux de code qui contiennent souvent un identifiant unique. Lorsque vous visitez un site web ou utilisez une application mobile, un ordinateur demande à votre ordinateur ou à votre appareil mobile l’autorisation de stocker ce fichier sur votre ordinateur ou votre appareil mobile et d’accéder aux informations. Les informations collectées par les cookies et les technologies similaires peuvent inclure la date et l’heure de la visite et la façon dont vous utilisez un site web ou une application mobile en particulier. Pourquoi utilisons-nous des cookies ? Les cookies veillent à ce que votre session reste active pendant votre visite sur notre boutique en ligne, que tous les articles restent dans votre panier, que vous puissiez faire vos achats en toute sécurité et que le site web continue de fonctionner sans problème. Les cookies nous permettent également de voir comment notre site est utilisé et comment nous pouvons l’améliorer. En fonction de vos préférences, nos propres cookies peuvent également être utilisés pour vous présenter des publicités ciblées correspondant à vos intérêts personnels. Quels types de cookies utilisons-nous ? Cookies fonctionnels Les cookies fonctionnels assurent le bon fonctionnement de notre site web. Cookies de préférences Les cookies de préférences permettent à un site web de mémoriser des informations qui influencent le comportement et la conception du site web. Cookies analytiques Les cookies analytiques nous donnent un aperçu de la manière dont notre site web est utilisé. Sur la base de ces informations, nous pouvons améliorer l’ergonomie de notre site web. Comment puis-je désactiver ou supprimer les cookies ? Vous pouvez choisir de désactiver tous les cookies, à l’exception de ceux nécessaires. Vous pouvez modifier les paramètres du navigateur pour vous assurer que les cookies sont bloqués. La plupart des navigateurs vous expliquent comment le faire dans la fonction d’aide. Toutefois, si vous bloquez les cookies, vous risquez de ne pas pouvoir profiter de toutes les fonctionnalités techniques que notre site web a à offrir et cela peut avoir un impact négatif sur votre expérience utilisateur. Accepter tous les cookies et continuer Enregistrer les préférences Refuser les cookies Notre site web ne fonctionnera pas sans l’activation de ces cookies. Et le mieux, c’est que nous ne faisons pas que proposer une des plus grandes sélections d’accessoires pour fumeur d’internet. Nos bas prix sont aussi imbattables ! VOUS CHERCHEZ DES FEUILLES À ROULER POUR CANNABIS OU UNE BALANCE OU UN BANG ? NOUS EN AVONS DANS NOTRE HEADSHOP Ne sous-estimez jamais l’ingéniosité humaine qui est appliquée depuis des années à l’art de la défonce ! En tant que consommateurs Occidentaux nous avons laissé de coté l’utilisation tribale des os creux d’oiseaux et des feuilles enroulées pour passer à une gamme toujours plus vaste d’outils consacrés à la fumette et d’accessoires de rangement, de préparation et de consommation de beuh. Des bangs et pipes classiques, aux vaporisateurs électriques en passant par les feuilles à rouler, nous possédons une large sélection de tout ceci sur notre site. Nous avons également tout le matériel nécessaire à l’allumage et au nettoyage de nos produits. Headshop - Cliquez ici pour plus d'informations Sous-catégories Top 10 Headshop Cendriers Bangs Livres Nourriture Cannabique Chillums Nettoyage Piments séchés, assaisonnements et plus Dabbing Cadeaux & Gadgets Grinders Sauces piquantes Brassage Amateur Briquets Fête Pipes Terpènes RAW Feuilles à rouler & Accessoires Plateau à Rouler Balances Chicha Rangement Produits USA Informations sur le Headshop de Zamnesia Zamnesia est l’unique étape pour tout ce qui concerne les produits de Headshop. Avec des centaines de produits répartis dans plusieurs grandes catégories, vous êtes sûr de trouver le produit dont vous avez besoin à un prix compétitif. Chaque article de notre Headshop comprend une description détaillée, des informations clés sur le produit, et des photos haute résolution, afin que vous sachiez exactement ce que vous achetez. Qu’Est-Ce Qu’Un Headshop ? Un headshop, également connu sous le nom de head shop ou smoke shop, est un point de vente spécialisé qui stocke toutes sortes d’articles liés à l’herbe, au tabac et à d’autres substances psychoactives. En entrant dans l’un de ces magasins, vous trouverez les murs tapissés de tous les accessoires pour fumeurs que vous pouvez imaginer. Vous y trouverez des dab rigs, des pipes à eau, des boîtes de stockage et toute une série d’articles. À Savoir Qu’est-ce qu’un headshop  ? Un headshop est un point de vente qui vend des accessoires pour fumer du cannabis et du tabac, comme des feuilles, des pipes et des bangs. Selon l’endroit où vous vous trouvez dans le monde, certains headshops vendent aussi légalement des substances psychoactives comme du kratom ou d’autres herbes légales. Chez Zamnesia, nous gérons une boutique en ligne qui sert de source d’accessoires pour la plupart des pays d’Europe. En plus d’offrir tout l’équipement standard, nous vendons également des produits haut de gamme comme des vaporisateurs, et gérons même un Vaporshop spécialisé. Pourquoi Le Nom De « Headshop » ? Les origines exactes du terme « headshop » restent obscures. Toutefois, l’une des nombreuses théories populaires détient probablement la vérité. Certains pensent que le mot « head » est l’acronyme de « He Eats Acid Daily ». D’autres proposent que le terme ait probablement des liens avec la description de « pothead ». Insatisfaits de ces réponses, d’autres s’interrogent sur le lien avec le célèbre groupe de rock américain The Grateful Dead. Leurs fidèles fans sont connus sous le nom de « Deadheads », et une énorme culture psychédélique tourne autour du groupe. Histoire Des Headshops Les headshops ont vu le jour dans les années 1960, alimentés par la contre-culture psychédélique de l’époque. Des dizaines de psychonautes universitaires ont alimenté la croissance de ces entreprises dans des zones comme West Los Angeles, San Francisco et Chicago Old Town. Au début, les headshops étaient fortement liés aux mouvements hippie et anti-guerre du Vietnam, ainsi qu’à des groupes militant pour la légalisation du cannabis. Tout comme aujourd’hui, ces headshops de première génération vendaient une grande variété d’accessoires controversés, allant de l’attirail pour fumeurs et des magazines aux sex toys et à l’art psychédélique. Le mouvement des headshops a commencé à s’essouffler à la suite de l’interdiction des accessoires en 1973. Cependant, à l’ère moderne, les headshops sont de retour en force. Les headshops modernes proposent des produits de haute technologie dont les fumeurs des années 60 ne pouvaient qu'imaginer dans leurs rêves. Quels Sont Les Meilleurs Accessoires Pour Fumer Du Cannabis? Les « meilleurs » accessoires pour fumer du cannabis restent un sujet subjectif. Chaque fumeur aura des préférences en ce qui concerne les produits essentiels qu’il utilise fréquemment. Chez Zamnesia, nous avons une très bonne idée de l’équipement le plus important dans la boîte à outils du fumeur. Bien qu’ils varient en termes de couleur, de taille et de fonction, tous les clients peuvent bénéficier des produits ci-dessous pour garantir une séance réussie. À Savoir Comment devriez-vous fumer de l’herbe ? Nous recommandons de commencer avec des joints ou de simples vaporisateurs . Ensuite, vous pouvez passer au dabbing , bangs et à des vaporisateurs plus sophistiqués. Support Pour Votre Herbe : Feuille, Pipes À Fumer, Bangs Avant tout, il faut un équipement qui permette de fumer du cannabis. Chaque fumeur a des préférences différentes et les headshops les satisferont tous. Choisissez parmi les feuilles à rouler , les cônes pré-roulés, les blunts, les pipes en verre (spoon pipe), les pipes à eau, les dab rigs, les bongs , les bubbles et les vaporisateurs. Grinder Les grinders pour herbe sont une pièce essentielle du kit. Plutôt que de mettre de gros morceaux de têtes dans une douille ou un joint, les grinders créent des granulés fins qui sont beaucoup plus faciles à manipuler. Choisissez parmi des matériaux comme l’acrylique, le bois et le métal. Les grinders simples sont dotés d’une seule chambre, tandis que les modèles plus complexes offrent plusieurs chambres et des plateaux de récupération du kief. Briquet À moins que vous ne prévoyiez d’utiliser le soleil et une loupe, ne pensez même pas à fumer de l’herbe sans un briquet fiable. Vous n’obtiendrez pas grand-chose sans en avoir un. Choisissez parmi les briquets Clipper, simples mais fonctionnels, ou les briquets torches, plus impressionnants et plus tape-à-l’œil. Machine à rouler La plupart des fumeurs de cannabis aiment le processus rituel du roulage. D’autres, toutefois, préfèrent rationaliser le processus avec des machines à rouler. Il suffit d’ajouter de l’herbe et une feuille, et ces appareils produisent un joint magnifiquement fait en quelques secondes. Boite De Stockage Les boîtes de stockage ( cachettes secrètes ) permettent de conserver tous vos objets de valeur dans un endroit facilement accessible. Choisissez parmi des modèles petits et simples, adaptés pour contenir votre briquet et vos feuilles, ou essayez des offres plus exotiques qui peuvent stocker tout votre matériel — et qui ont l’air d’être camouflées sur votre étagère. Plateau De Roulage Les plateaux de roulage empêchent les particules d’herbes de se répandre sur votre tapis. Si vous avez déjà roulé un joint sans plateau, vous savez à quel point les choses peuvent être salissantes. Utilisez un plateau de roulage pour garder les choses propres et faire durer votre réserve plus longtemps. Cendrier Les cendriers sont essentiels pour garder les braises et les cendres, et pour empêcher que vos vêtements et votre tapis ne soient brûlés de temps en temps. Notre headshop vend une grande variété de cendriers, allant de simples pièces en acier inoxydable à des options très décoratives et comiques. À Savoir Où pouvez-vous vous trouver les produits du headshop ? Les clients peuvent se rendre dans les headshops en personne. Toutefois, les headshops en ligne comme Zamnesia proposent une large gamme de produits que vous pouvez consulter dans le confort de votre maison. MATÉRIEL POUR ROULER Utilisé depuis le XVIe siècle, les feuilles à rouler constituent l’épine dorsale de l’industrie des headshop. Toutefois, au fil des ans, l’humble feuille à rouler s’est transformé en une gamme de feuilles, de tailles, de matériaux, et de motifs différents, ainsi que plusieurs options pour les filtres et les cartons. Si vous n’avez pas encore appris l’art de rouler, vous pouvez aussi trouver des machines à rouler et des cônes pré-roulés pour garder le plaisir de rouler — peu importe votre niveau de compétence. Ne risquez pas de perdre votre sang-froid, vos feuilles ou votre grinder en investissant dans notre fantastique sélection de plateaux de roulage. Nous avons même des options haut de gamme dotées de caractéristiques de haute technologie pour une expérience de roulage ultime, avec différentes formes et styles. Restez organisé avec un plateau de roulage pour chaque situation. Les grinders sont une nécessité fondamentale - vous ne pouvez pas placer de têtes géantes à l’intérieur d’un joint bien serré. C’est pourquoi nous avons des grinders conçus pour convenir à tous les budgets, en métal, plastique, acrylique, et autres matériaux. Même si vous voulez un grinder simplement pour le look, plutôt que pour la fon

What is GABA?

HGH is a hormone secreted by the pituitary gland. It can aid in muscle building and stimulate fat reduction. It accomplishes this by inducing the liver to produce insulin-like growth factor-1 (IGF-1). IGF-1, in turn, stimulates muscle protein synthesis and growth. Here at Underdoglabs™, all of our products are manufactured only in GMP-certified facilities and are Pharmaceutical grade. GMP refers to the Good Manufacturing Practice Regulations promulgated by the US Food and Drug Administrations under the authority of the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act. underdoglabs™ Lifescience goes one step further by using advanced analytical methods, such as high-performance liquid chromatography ( HPLC ) and gas chromatography/mass spectrometry, to ensure our products meet label claims for potency and purity. Underdoglabs™ tests its products using US Pharmacopeia and other exacting pharmaceutical assay standards. Finally, a Certificate of Analysis (COA) guaranteeing every one of our products’ quality, potency, and purity is kept on file and available. For more information please download the COA on every product page. We believe the quality of our products is finest, hereby we fully stand by our products & offer full refund as our guarantee program. What does Underdoglabs™ do to ensure the quality of its products? FDA registered, USA based analytical testing laboratories are used for all of our product testing. Each batch is first tested by manufacturer & double tested by us in laboratory and COA (certificate of analysis) is released on the basis of lab tests. Only after our Director of Quality Control determines the materials are compliant and per specifications, are they inventoried and made available for production. Some of our key laboratory procedures and objectives are: • Advanced analytical methods for testing the quality and efficacy of products. • Documentation of Certificate of Analysis for every product. • Procedures that follow industry-standard methodologies such as ASTM, ISO, as well as US, European, and Japanese Pharmacopoeia. • 3rd Party laboratory testing. The bottom line is we are fully commited to assuring our customers receive only the finest and purest ingredients. What's the difference between tablets, capsules and Powder? Material inside the capsules are exactly as same as powder form with same potency. It is better to intake in powdered form if one is taking more than one supplement. Powdered form have more bioavailability and better absorbed by body. If you want a capsule form, a person can buy empty gelatin capsules and fill the powder himself and save big bucks. To this day, I am grateful to him. He helped me a lot in achieving my goals (mainly Memostim, although my friend indirectly helped too :D). When I describe its (again, Memostim's :D) effects to my friends, I say this: sometimes you think it would be good to do something productive – vacuum, clean up, plan your week, exercise. Memostim makes you take these thoughts seriously much more often and get into action. That's how it is for me. I recommend it. Bartass89 NOOPEPTIL™ MAX, 29.04.2020 I drank a lot of alcohol, but since I started taking it, I became smarter, gave up alcohol, my brain worked faster and more efficiently, and processed information more quickly. I joined a gym, gained new qualifications, learned about nutrition in a very thorough way, analyzing every aspect without getting tired. I should add that I am a melancholic person, so my personality is helpful for this. You can think very intensely and your brain doesn't “wear out” in the process. I finished the supplementation in mid-January, and to this day I can say that it works about 75%, so there is definitely a difference compared to before I started taking it. Maybe it makes you too “serious” and analytical and less inclined to joke around, but it's definitely a big plus. Reading corner Publications 29 December 2025 Telomeres – a key to an infinite life? Although Sunifiram a Piracetam analogue, its chemical structure does not contain a pyrrolidinone ring and therefore it is not strictly speaking a member of the racetam family. Although Sunifiram is a relatively new nootropic, initial research is promising and suggests that it is a stimulatory nootropic with anti-amnesiac and cognitive enhancing properties. It has also been shown to be virtually non-toxic. INGREDIENTS One tablet consists of 10mg Sunifiram. A package contains 20, 40, 100 or 200 capsules. Long story why we sell intermediate and not fosigotifator itself is below in description. IUPAC Name: 2-(4-chloro-3-fluorophenoxy)-N-[4-[[2-(4-chloro-3-fluorophenoxy)acetyl]amino]-3-hydroxy-1-bicyclo[2.2.2]octanyl]acetamide SMILES: OC1CC2(CCC1(CC2)NC(=O)COc3ccc(Cl)c(F)c3)NC(=O)COc4ccc(Cl)c(F)c4 CAS: 2144474-93-9 Fosigotifator Intermediate 11 Choose an option 1 g 10 g 5 g 500 mg 1 g 10 g 5 g 500 mg Clear Fosigotifator (ABBV-CLS-7262) Intermediate 11 quantity Add to cart Description This is arguably one of the most ambitious projects our team has ever undertaken. Synthesizing this intermediate required an enormous amount of time and effort, especially considering war impact on conditions of our work. Why are we selling the intermediate instead of the final Fosigotifator? We deliberately chose not to perform the last two stages of the synthesis. These steps do not affect the bioactivity of the final compound – they only influence its water solubility. However, completing them is economically impractical: the final two steps each have a yield of about 50% ; the separation of the chiral alcohol via chiral HPLC gives another ~50% yield ; considering the starting material costs around $900 per gram , the combined yields (0.5 × 0.5 × 0.5) mean that 1 gram of the intermediate produces about 0.125 g of Fosigotifator ; once you add labor, flash chromatography of the final compound, and chiral chromatography to separate the isomers, the final price would increase by 10-12× . Because of this, routine production of the final Fosigotifator is not economically viable. Can we produce the final Fosigotifator? Yes. For customers who specifically need the finished compound, we can carry out the complete synthesis upon request under custom synthesis terms. Cost and timelines depend on the required quantity and purity. Bromantane is a widely used in research atypical psychostimulant and anxiolytic. Chemically it is a derivative of adamantine with interesting pharmacological profile. The drug was developed, like many nootropics, in Russia, for the treatment of neurasthenia. Unfortunately (or fortunately), most scientific works are Russian, what may cause some skepticism. The exact mechanism of action is not known, but there are some prerequisites. As befits ancient Russian studies, the effects of bromantane were established purely statistically. The drug has established itself as an atypical psychostimulant and anxiolytic. Researches speculate that it is a dopamine and serotonin reuptake inhibitor and / or releaser. To less extent, the same is observed with norepinephrine. Drug increases the strength of the alpha rhythm and reduces the strength of the beta and delta rhythms. This partly proves its stimulating effect. The alpha rhythm is detected during training and normal wakefulness of a person. In the transition from wrestling to sleep, the alpha rhythm is replaced by the sigma rhythm, followed by theta waves. During light sleep, a delta rhythm is observed. The beta rhythm is a kind of calm state during wakefulness, it is also observed while taking GABA-A agonsits and other drugs that increase inhibitory neurotransmission. Also, the beta rhythm occurs during the rapid (REM) phase of sleep. Thus, due to its peculiar effect on the electrical rhythms of the brain and an increase in the volume of working memory, bromantane is believed to gieve a productive state for performing various mental work. In previous articles, we briefly mentioned long-term potentiation of signal transmission (also known as LTP). So, there is still a short-term potentiation, which is enhanced by the hero of today’s review. This is achieved through intricate mechanisms of influence on the synthesis of messenger RNA and dopamine neurotransmission, however, it is not planned to review these phenomena in detail within the framework of this article, but since we are talking about RNA, it would be a sin not to note that bromantane increases the expression of enzymes that synthesize dopamine. Due to an indirect increase in the synthesis of dopamine, the drug reduces the systemic amount of prolactin, which may be of interest to users using antipsychotics and bodybuilding. Bromantane reduces the concentration of pro-inflammatory cytokines (both in the central nervous system and in the periphery), due to which it may be appropriate during all sorts of depression and inflammatory diseases. Well, cherry on the cake – this drug releases neurotrophic factors.
